name: Project_RUN
description:
The game is still in development and you can try out our free demo. This demo contains the parkour aspect of the game. You can grab onto ledges, slide down ropes, roll after jumping. You can also time your levels and beat your previous records.

Control Scheme

WASD - movement

Shift - Sprint

C - Crouch, roll(only when jumping from great heights) and slide(only while sprinting)

Left Click - Interact

Right Click - Aim at ledge

The game is played in first person.
